__e: A few days are OK but you get yourself stove up, you might as well pack it in, get yourself another boss, cos I don't need no cripple.
If you don't think you have a complete concept of what we're trying to do then we should just pack up and go home right now.
Get your waitress to wrap your dinner and we'll retire to more private environs where I'll tell you of the vast amounts of money to be made in the service of God.
